name: Skate Master - Flip 360
description:
Become the best skater on the halfpipe! Jump at full speed and pull off amazing tricks!
Collect all the characters, boards and locations. Skate has never been more fun!

Are you ready to beat the high score and become the best skater?

Unlock all the characters! Each character has its own stats. Better characters will get more points and earn more coins.

Unlock all the boards! Better boards will get higher and accelerate faster.

Unlock all the tricks! More difficult tricks will get you more points!

Unlock cool locations! Don’t skate always in the same place.

Quick and simple gameplay. Just tap and hold to flip, and release to land. That’s it!

Download it now! You can play offline!
